content:
Rewrite this for brevity, in outline form:

“The diversity \[OI offers\] means you really can leverage experience from everything. Having broad information about what’s going on, having that information source for me and for a small company as we are, that’s something that’s almost priceless.”

##### Sascha Huber | President, RUAG Inc.

“Our OperationsInc resource was tremendously valuable to me in a recent talent search. She was fast, reliable and thorough. Excellent!”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20170%2050'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Ann Hutchinson | HR Manager, PEZ Candy Inc.

“The team at OperationsInc is a valued and trusted partner for us at Hitachi Capital America. We couldn’t be as successful as we are without the ongoing support of the HR professionals at OI.”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20138%2040'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Joni Kovac | VP, Human Resources, Hitachi Capital America Corp.

“This was one of the best professional consulting experience I have encountered in my 30+ years of HR administration. Fast, accurate knowledgeable, responsible and pleasant. You can’t ask for more than that.”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20170%2050'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Joanne Cordaro | SVP Human Resources, Mercy First

“The OperationsInc team is always a pleasure to work with. I have complete trust in their knowledge and work accuracy. Thank you for providing excellent services to Laerdal! You help make each day a bit easier for HR professionals like us.”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20170%2050'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Kelley Hoff | HR Generalist, Laerdal Medical Corporation

“I have appreciated the consistently excellent responsiveness and expertise of the OperationsInc professionals. Their knowledge and experience has provided us a great deal of comfort – especially when addressing HR issues.”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20170%2050'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Mark Hettinger | SVP Legal, Walker Digital Table Systems

“The team was knowledgeable, easy to communicate with, and helped me organize and review our company’s ACA data in a way that wasn’t completely overwhelming and time consuming. The filings were accurate and done before the deadlines—I couldn’t have asked for a smoother process!”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20170%2050'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Sarah Torpey | Senior Manager, Human Resources, Freepoint Commodities, LLC

“Nothing but positive experience and I’d advise anyone considering outsourcing HR to do so. We rely on our OperationsInc HR specialist for so much and she is extreme effective and professional. Her contributions to our company are immeasurable and we have the utmost respect for her. She’s the best!”

##### Angela Manning | Salesian Missions, HR Administrator

“OpsInc provides expertise and a professional finished product. They were quick to respond and correct any issues that arose during the project. This is our 4th consecutive year working on the Total Comp Statements and we are again very happy with the results.”

##### Elise Tenney | Compensation Program Manager, HR, OceanFirst Bank

“Over two years of working with your payroll team, on implementation of our ADP system and continuous bi-weekly payroll processing. It is a value to have a resources of payroll professionals who have worked for ADP in the past – knowing this technology and how it works has been key to our internal team as we developed this tool for our business.”

##### Lisa Tesoro | Director HR, Acme United

“OperationsInc is a great payroll partner. They are very flexible and help us navigate our specific needs. They make the payroll process extremely fast and easy. Their services are very affordable as well.”

##### Nick Swanson | Controller, Yasso Inc.

“The diversity \[OI offers\] means you really can leverage experience from everything. Having broad information about what’s going on, having that information source for me and for a small company as we are, that’s something that’s almost priceless.”

##### Sascha Huber | President, RUAG Inc.

“Our OperationsInc resource was tremendously valuable to me in a recent talent search. She was fast, reliable and thorough. Excellent!”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20170%2050'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
##### Ann Hutchinson | HR Manager, PEZ Candy Inc.

“The team at OperationsInc is a valued and trusted partner for us at Hitachi Capital America. We couldn’t be as successful as we are without the ongoing support of the HR professionals at OI.”

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20138%2040'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
